subject: how to read JUnit report programatically
msgSnippet: Hi all, I want to send the mail to client after the test suit run. So is there any way i can come to know how many test cases have passed and how many
messageBody:
Hi all,

I want to send the mail to client after the test suit run. So is there any way i can come to know how many test cases have passed and how many testcases have failed programatically??
